title: The fool turn'd critick a comedy : as it was acted at the Theatre-Royall, by His Majesties servants / by T.D. ...
author: D'Urfey, Thomas, 1653-1723.
publisher: Printed for James Magnes and Richard Bentley ...,
notes: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
With music (melodies of the songs, unaccompanied).
Attributed to Thomas D'Urfey. cf. BM.
